rankings.title: The Green Rush at State Borders: Difference-in-Discontinuities for Marijuana Effects on Employment (Idea 2)
conditions: expanding treated states/borders to raise treated border clusters
explicitly modeling anticipation using event time around election

rankings.title: High on Employment? A Spatial RDD of Recreational Marijuana Legalization Effects on Industry-Specific Labor Markets (Idea 1)
Drug Testing Industries vs. Non-Testing Industries: A Triple-Difference Approach (Idea 4)
conditions: obtaining a credible panel of testing prevalence by industry over a long pre-period
or a plausibly time-invariant pre-period measure
pre-registering a small set of industry groups to avoid specification search

rankings.title: Cross-Border Commuting Zones: Labor Market Spillovers from Marijuana Legalization (Idea 3)
Age-Specific Effects: Youth Employment and the Minimum Legal Age (Idea 5)
